description: a(n) = number of (s(0), s(1), ..., s(n)) such that s(i) is a nonnegative integer and |s(i) - s(i-1)| = 1 for i = 1,2,...,n and s(0) = 2. Also a(n) = sum of numbers in row n+1 of array T defined in A026009.
formula: a(2n) = (3n + 1)/(2n + 1) C(2n + 1, n), n>=0 a(2n-1) = a(2n)/2, n>=1 - _Herbert Kociemba_, May 08 2004a(n) = sum{k=0..n, C(floor((n+k)/2), floor(k/2))} - _Paul Barry_, Jul 15 2004Inverse binomial transform of A005774: (1, 3, 9, 26, 75, 216,...). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 22 2007Conjecture: (n+3)*a(n) -2*a(n-1) +(-5*n-3)*a(n-2) +2*a(n-3) +4*(n-3)*a(n-4)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 20 2013
